mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_NAME, PRICE, GOODS_TYPE, GOODS_NUMBER, GOODS_IMAGE, TRADER_ID FROM GOODS WHERE TRADER_ID = #{traderId} ORDER BY GOODS_NUMBER DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS (GOODS_NAME, GOODS_TYPE, PRICE, GOODS_DESCRIPTION, GOODS_NUMBER, GOODS_IMAGE, TRADER_ID) VALUES (#{goodsName}, #{goodsType}, #{price}, #{goodsDescription}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.GOODS_NUMBER), 0) + 1 FROM GOODS A), #{goodsImage}, #{traderId})
